c841c8a7-a239-4f06-9759-54cc637ad56f: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
0deb8838-2f2e-44da-96df-8c592f137aaa: All toxic, mental, and {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}, as well as all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} is reduced by −{uip|DamageReduction|e0bad88dd53b4a748b7f43156bf2f85c}%.
c25642fb-ca8c-484e-a1e1-c42b5b8aff81: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.
a0efdb1a-c2ca-4171-b237-1653add204f6: Allies within 2 cells around the character deal +{uip|DamageBonus|c67b58acea374a82a9b6b1d971f15581}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and suffer −{uip|DamageReduction|c67b58acea374a82a9b6b1d971f15581}% less damage. If multiple characters have this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, the effect does not stack.
ffc4ef0a-44aa-4030-9bb3-0439d6d3945d: Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.
d019624d-c971-41a9-b2d4-39417f0de569: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by half of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of that armour.
2797693b-8d9d-4eba-a6b6-d6fc490f1639: At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.
028e21d8-8e9b-44a4-9acb-c106f52d480f: During the first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} of combat, the character has +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
478bb7d8-499f-44bb-a09d-76ebd62ce918:
Enemies that have 0 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} or 0% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against the character's attacks suffer +10% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the character.
If an enemy has both 0 deflection and 0% armour, those damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack.
95db111e-6897-49d9-a232-76f6a95ab961: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
648dc9ba-bebf-45e4-b9b6-a8367872c498: Every character's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.
2ddb1939-065d-4afc-b8f8-67fbe4be0ba1: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.
67517663-d992-4726-9a96-cb12c4a7256f: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.
1e5660d2-6d48-4d98-a9e5-71770ea3aa01: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).
0cf0afa5-48a1-438b-b664-c1b7b126dc0b: If the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} is higher than the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against that enemy is increased by +2% for every 5% difference between the character's armour penetration and the enemy's armour.
7a4d52d3-aca3-4c23-b083-ed3236a1c259: If the character's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} is higher than the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} (before applying the heavy (0.75) or medium (0.5) armour penalty modifier), the character's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy is increased by +1% for every 5% difference between the character's dodge reduction and the enemy's dodge. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} damage is tripled for {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
65e7465b-9b04-496a-ac17-3bfc65bfad53:
Mere survival in the grim darkness of the far future is no easy task, to thrive in it — a next to impossible one. But some manage to go beyond and become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTiersGlossary}Exemplars{/g}. Not only do Exemplars possess extraordinary knowledge in their given {g|Encyclopedia:Careers}archetypes{/g}, but they have also reached the pinnacle of mastery, transcending what is thought to be possible.
Core focus: additional {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from previous archetypes, new Exemplar talents.
15d7e990-79cb-4d93-87a6-6fb199fd123b: Targets that consider the character a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} deal −40% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the character's allies.
2dd36f97-2ff0-41f1-af43-0362434574da: The character becomes an unsanctioned psyker and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
9505e793-fbfd-4667-85ea-c2791737bd27: The character becomes immune to all effects that reduce their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They gain +{uip|MovementPoints|e2feb6faef0d404e874f07b3ed51a888} MP.
c187381b-8317-43f1-9d6d-92d0bee13d62: The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
497d1ff1-dd02-44dd-96ab-c957d3a63853: The character gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} as long as they have no {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons equipped (staves do not count as ranged weapons).
f68ab6f9-c1cc-4265-939b-47fe306d949a: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.
0408085c-275c-4915-98b2-0c0877c98a3a: The character gains a +{uip|Bonus|8d29b109e6c64a59b58cf1830271911e}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}, critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} chance.
b948d8a8-8e3b-41a6-9bde-dd8278e02449: The character gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} equal to +{uip|ResistanceBonus|8b80a2f703bb4568875b78c473ed74ba}.
54465bc6-4401-4673-9b71-2b32c97cef71: The character gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
8033593d-1d8c-42fe-9b1d-b38e3a974be1: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.
9f2d26f6-5f8a-415d-83db-c58654fdcd28: The character ignores {uip|DeflectionReduction|f80d633400694ea0b4c73e69ebd03b2c} of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} (rounded down).
02782706-2c95-4298-a803-6f5d3c038817: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.
2ad26d91-f0d0-40e7-8cef-9ec994381b2e: The character's attacks gain an additional +{uip|Overpenetration|df6c348d0bbc490a8d6483ddaf99740b}% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}. Their overpenetration attacks cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.
91661ef3-4367-4241-a304-283d69727af2: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.
af20a3ee-9f1c-4123-8526-7076fddbfa56: The character's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} are increased by +7% of their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
6d72f46c-3037-4bed-8d55-25721ed7cd94: The character's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is doubled against single-target attacks.
dee84be1-9021-407a-9d8a-368f08c519f9: The character's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} reduction and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
25b4fdde-0e34-41d7-930a-c06491266187: The character's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and maximum ammo of their weapons are increased by +30% (rounded up).
bf3e7ce6-fc95-4a15-964c-bf6bdc46c264: When allies take actions on {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g} given by the character, they deal +15% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
e5204012-3120-4502-bd6c-a81193a632ed: When targets {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} by the character collide with enemies or {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, both the target and the object they collide with suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|f09d24a1a5ee47f5b5d2826d3e32856c} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
70778d4a-7ef1-47f4-a9d3-74775a789723: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.
29d5106c-2924-443a-ade7-16d66acbc407: When the character's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets other than their main target, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.
d2e0e46b-a4e9-426d-b439-a58f9313f54d: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is doubled.
24741fce-ce07-4179-82e3-7af91a7b1fec: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.
3853642f-29d9-4dbe-89ce-c365a454b0c0: Whenever the character is attacked by an enemy, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the attacking creature.
95d6b4ce-fb38-4782-a6a0-9cd2f8707e91: Whenever the character is healed, they regain +{uip|HealingBonus|67d48e2a1862454d97106e06b4c1ed2a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
de5c6ec8-98f2-49b6-8f6e-ade61ee039cf: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.
0701a8be-74e3-408c-962f-96ea4407db9a:
Whenever the character pushes an enemy, the character gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Those MP are added after the attack and allow the character to continue movement.
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by collisions from pushes is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%.
06bdd4ce-0b41-4fd8-96c2-2da2d15573e4: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to add their critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the second time. This chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (to a minimum of 0%).
9b96fd4a-9dde-4dd8-b3ec-6c5fc08a6270: Whenever you apply {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effects, one random enemy within 5 cells of the target also gains that effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The same happens if you inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, but the random target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid the effect.
a4ad58d2-4da1-4e49-acec-de13e32578e7: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from the character's {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} attacks does not decrease.
c11bb8d1-e284-41e9-a3f7-5c0ffca8bf9b: {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shot{/g} deals an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|0b113627def5404cb1d94310c85edfb8}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The following {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain deadeye shot benefits (× 1.5 range and the additional damage from the {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} itself): -{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s Claim the Bounty -{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s Finish the Job -{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s Death Whisper -Assassin's Killing Edge -Assassin's Dispatch -{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s Dismantling Attack -Bounty Hunter's Wild Hunt
